bowl_shop.title: The Bowl Shop
bowl_shop.description: A mock restaurant Vue.js app, made by displaying each component page on click of the pages tabs.

isolation.title: Isolation
isolation.description: Isolation is a text adventure made with Vue.js. Location data is stored in JSON files, as will character data in the future. Currently in development.

js_char.title: Character Creator
js_char.description: A Dark Souls inspired character creator. Characters are created with randomly generated stats. Those stat's are then used in a battle against a randomly generated opponent.

js_form.title: Sign Up Form
js_form.description: A sign up form validated using Javascript. The form's input element are checked for proper length, and value. User's are given feedback on blur, focus, and submit.

php_form.title: Contact Form
php_form.description: A World of Warcraft themed contact form. Validation is done via PHP, and users are show feedback through an AJAX request on submit.

lorem_ipsum.title: Fantasy Babble Generator
lorem_ipsum.description: A fantasy Lorem Impsum generator made using arrays and PHP's "mt_rand" function.
